headline: Axon Enterprise, Inc. (AXON): A Bull Case Theory
summary: We came across a bullish thesis on Axon Enterprise, Inc. (AXON) on Hidden Market Gems’ Substack. In this article, we will summarize the bulls’ thesis on AXON. Axon Enterprise, Inc. (AXON)’s share was trading at $750.36 as of 30th May. AXON’s trailing and forward P/E were 180.68 and 109.89 respectively according to Yahoo Finance. Axon Enterprise, Inc. […]
